concept.title: Field Definitions of the Product String
concept.shortdesc: List of field definitions contained in the product string and their definitions.

row.entry: The identifier used to track a product. This identifier is used to populate the Products report. Be sure to use the same identifier through the checkout process.
The number of units purchased. This field must be set with a purchase event to be recorded.
Refers to the combined cost of the total units purchased, not to the unit cost. This field must be set with a purchase event to be recorded.
Custom events associated to a particular product; for example, discounts.
Values associated with a specific product, such as merchandising category.
